data.title: BATTLE OF THE NETWORK STARS 9 (ABC 12
data.meta_description: Hosts: Howard Cosell, Cathy Lee Crosby (“That’s Incredible!”). ABC Team: Captain: John Davidson (“That’s Incredible!”); Willie Aames (“Eight is Enough”); Scott Baio (“Happy Days”); Phyllis Davis (“Vega$”); Donna Dixon (“Bosom Buddies”); Max Gail (“Barney Miller”); Ann Jillian (“It’s A Living”); Susan Richardson (“Eight
data.text: Hosts: Howard Cosell, Cathy Lee Crosby (“That’s Incredible!”). ABC Team: Captain: John Davidson (“That’s Incredible!”); Willie Aames (“Eight is Enough”); Scott Baio (“Happy Days”); Phyllis Davis (“Vega$”); Donna Dixon (“Bosom Buddies”); Max Gail (“Barney Miller”); Ann Jillian (“It’s A Living”); Susan Richardson (“Eight is Enough”). NBC Team: Captain: Arte Johnson (“Games People Play”); Bryon Allen (“Real People”); John Beck (“Flamingo Road”); Greg Evigan (“B.J. and the Bear”); Erin Gray (“Buck Rogers in the 25th Century”); Judy Landers (“B.J. and the Bear”); Sarah Purcell (“Real People”); Christina Raines (“Flamingo Road”). CBS Team: Captain: Jamie Farr (“M*A*S*H”); Gregory Harrison (“Trapper John, M.D.”); Diane Ladd (“Alice”); Donna Mills (“Knots Landing”); Judy Norton-Taylor (“The Waltons”); Tom Selleck (“Magnum, P.I.”); Joan Van Ark (“Knots Landing”); Robert Walden (“Lou Grant”). Contains original network commercials including Tom Selleck for Chaz Aftershave; Suzanne Somers for Ace Hardware)
